title: 110: The Republic, Book IV
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: This is the fourth installment of our series on Plato's Republic. In this one we finally get to the meaning of justice. We also feel bad for some of the warriors. They're getting a pretty raw deal.
itunes:author: Hams, Grams, and Trams
itunes:subtitle: Because stopping at three wasn't good enough
itunes:summary: This is the fourth installment of our series on Plato's Republic. In this one we finally get to the meaning of justice. We also feel bad for some of the warriors. They're getting a pretty raw deal.
